channel.title: Comments on: Ryan takes home the trophy – Uber Geek of the year
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: Greg I believe it was built by my boss&apos;s kids.
item.content:encoded: Greg I believe it was built by my boss's kids.

item.title: By: Greg Vena
item.dc:creator: Greg Vena
item.description: Fantastic Trophy. Can you put me in touch with the person who designed/produced it.
item.content:encoded: Fantastic Trophy. Can you put me in touch with the person who designed/produced it.

item.title: By: Adrock
item.dc:creator: Adrock
item.description:
Awesome trophy! Congrats!
I think you guys at WebTools may be in danger of having too much fun at work. ;-)
